WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.AS_STATUS_CD <> '34' /*처리완료*/ AND A.ITG_CUST_NO = #{itgCustNo} /*통합고객번호(필수)*/
AND A.CNSLG_YMDHMS BETWEEN #{staSubmitDate} AND #{endSubmitDate} /*AS접수기간*/
AND A.TRT_CMPT_DT BETWEEN #{staCmptDate} AND #{endCmptDate} /*AS완료기간*/
mapper.select: SELECT /* com.ceragem.api.as.dao.AsmAsHstDao.selectAsHistoryCount */ COUNT(1) AS TOTAL_CNT, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN A.AS_STATUS_CD='33' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS CANCEL_CNT FROM AS_SUBMIT_BAS A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ITG_CUST_NO = #{itgCustNo} /*통합고객번호*/

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_INDEX , A.* FROM ( SELECT /* com.ceragem.api.as.dao.AsmAsHstDao.selectList */ A.AS_SUBMIT_NO /*AS접수번호*/ , A.ITG_CUST_NO /*통합고객번호*/ , A.CSAG_EMP_ID /*AS접수자사원ID*/ , A.CNSLG_PRSN_EMP_NM /*AS접수자*/ , A.CNSLG_YMDHMS AS SUBMIT_DATE /*접수일자*/ , CASE WHEN A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID WHEN A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID IS NULL AND A.TRT_PIC_EMP_ID IS NOT NULL THEN A.TRT_PIC_EMP_ID WHEN A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID IS NULL AND A.TRT_PIC_EMP_ID IS NULL THEN '' ELSE A.TRT_PIC_EMP_ID /*AS처리담당자사원ID*/ END AS TRT_PIC_EMP_ID , CASE WHEN A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT USER_NM FROM AS_USER_BAS WHERE USER_ID = A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID) WHEN A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID IS NULL AND A.TRT_PIC_EMP_ID IS NOT NULL THEN A.TRT_PIC_NM WHEN A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID IS NULL AND A.TRT_PIC_EMP_ID IS NULL THEN '' ELSE A.TRT_PIC_NM END AS TRT_PIC_NM /*AS처리담당자*/ , A.TRT_CMPT_DT /*처리완료일시*/ , A.GODS_SRIAL_NO /*제품일련번호*/ , A.GODS_EXPLN_NM /*제품명*/ , A.MODEL_CD /*모델코드*/ , A.MODEL_NM /*모델명*/ , ( SELECT LISTAGG(BAD_SYMTM_NM,'/') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY BAD_SYMTM_SEQ) AS BAD_SYMTM_NM FROM AS_BAD_SYMTM_DTL WHERE AS_SUBMIT_NO = A.AS_SUBMIT_NO AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) AS BAD_SYMTM_NM /*불량증상명*/ , ( SELECT LISTAGG(PROD_NM,'/') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY TRT_PROD_SEQ) AS ACTN_CTNTS FROM AS_USE_PROD_DTL WHERE AS_SUBMIT_NO = A.AS_SUBMIT_NO AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) AS ACTN_CTNTS /*조치내용*/ , A.TOT_AMT /*총금액*/ , A.TVEXPNS_AMT /*출장비금액*/ , A.PAY_AMT /*결제금액 =>서비스비용*/ , A.DC_AMT /*할인금액*/ , A.SMS_RMARK /*SMS비고(접수내용)*/ , A.SUBMIT_RMARK /*접수비고(접수내용)*/ , A.TRT_RMARK /*처리비고(조치사항)*/ , A.AS_STATUS_CD /*AS상태코드*/ , FN_COMN_CD_NM('C07', A.AS_STATUS_CD) AS AS_STATUS_NM FROM AS_SUBMIT_BAS A
ORDER BY A.AMD_DT DESC, TO_NUMBER(A.AS_SUBMIT_NO) DESC ) A ) T WHERE T.ROW_INDEX BETWEEN NVL(#{firstRecordIndex},1) AND NVL(#{lastRecordIndex},30)

SELECT /* com.ceragem.api.as.dao.AsmAsHstDao.select */ A.AS_SUBMIT_NO /*AS접수번호*/ , A.ITG_CUST_NO /*통합고객번호*/ , A.BOS_CUST_NO /*BOS고객번호*/ , A.CUST_NM /*고객명*/ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256', A.MPHON_NO, '') AS MPHON_NO /*이동전화번호*/ , A.ZIP_CD /*우편번호*/ , A.ADDR_1_CTNTS /*주소1내용*/ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256', A.ADDR_2_CTNTS, '') AS ADDR_2_CTNTS /*주소2내용*/ , A.GODS_SRIAL_NO /*제품일련번호*/ , A.GODS_EXPLN_NM /*제품명*/ , A.AS_STATUS_CD /*AS상태코드*/ , FN_COMN_CD_NM('C07', A.AS_STATUS_CD) AS AS_STATUS_CD_NM /*AS상태코드명*/ , A.AS_TRT_DIV_CD /*AS처리구분코드*/ , FN_COMN_CD_NM('AS110', A.AS_TRT_DIV_CD) AS AS_TRT_DIV_CD_NM /*AS처리구분코드명*/ , A.CNSLG_PRSN_EMP_NM /*AS접수자*/ , A.VISIT_EXPT_DAY /*방문예정일*/ , A.VISIT_EXPT_HOUR /*방문예정시간*/ , A.SUBMIT_RMARK /*AS상담내용*/ , A.TRT_ATTCH_FILE_ID /*첨부사진*/ , A.TOT_AMT /*총금액*/ , A.TVEXPNS_AMT /*출장비금액*/ , A.DC_AMT /*할인금액*/ , A.PAY_AMT /*서비스비용*/ , CASE WHEN A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT USER_NM FROM AS_USER_BAS WHERE USER_ID = A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID) WHEN A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID IS NULL AND A.TRT_PIC_EMP_ID IS NOT NULL THEN A.TRT_PIC_NM WHEN A.ASG_CHNG_USER_ID IS NULL AND A.TRT_PIC_EMP_ID IS NULL THEN '' ELSE A.TRT_PIC_NM END AS TRT_PIC_NM /*AS담당자*/ , (SELECT MPHON_NO FROM AS_USER_BAS WHERE EMP_ID = A.TRT_PIC_EMP_ID) AS TRT_PIC_MPHON_NO /*AS담당자 연락처 : 조직관리 이동전화번호*/ , A.TRT_CMPT_DT /*처리완료일시*/ , A.SMS_RMARK /*SMS비고(접수내용)*/ , A.SUBMIT_RMARK /*접수비고(접수내용)*/ , A.TRT_RMARK /*처리비고(조치사항)*/ , A.INSTLL_ZIP_CD /*설치우편번호*/ , A.INSTLL_ADDR_1_CTNTS /*설치주소1내용*/ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256', A.INSTLL_ADDR_2_CTNTS, '') AS INSTLL_ADDR_2_CTNTS /*설치주소2내용*/ FROM AS_SUBMIT_BAS A WHERE A.AS_SUBMIT_NO = #{asSubmitNo} AND A.ITG_CUST_NO = #{itgCustNo} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
